TextView.android:text: The Thakur Prasad calendar is a much talked about calendar and has been released by Rupesh Thakur Prasad. This calendar includes festivals, annual horoscopes, almanacs, disha shool and wedding dates. Below is the calendar according to every month and detailed information about the fast festivals coming in every month is also given.
